description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
http://gotosthlm.com

Steven Borrelli - Founder & CEO of Asteris

ABSTRACT
In this talk we’ll walk through a modern production stack, everything from cloud deployment to load balancing based on our experience of developing Mantl.io. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:

title: GOTO 2016 • Building a Modern Infrastructure Stack • Steven Borelli
